name: A Little Stroll
description:
Controls:  Spacebar = Jump  |  Ctrl = Crouch

A Little Stroll is an immersive, personal, and emotional experience detailing the journey toward recovery of a person suffering from anxiety and depression.

It is a 3D, on-rails platformer where the player must make their way through the
pits and falls of progression, where obstacles block their way in-game to symbolize the trials of mental improvement. The player will progress through a series of stages that represent the emotional battles faced by the protagonist every day ranging from fear of the unknown to hope for the future.

Game Credits:

House by EVA3D.
Volcano assets by DISTANT LANDS.
Underground Maze assets by WONDER GAMES.
Animal Models by ACORN BRINGER.
Day Skybox by BOXOPHOBIC.
Trees, Rocks, and Forest Landcape assets by JUSTCREATE.
Base Code by Michael Baker.
